amendment.description: To appropriate $20,000,000 to the Office for Domestic Preparedness to be used for grants to urban areas with large tourist populations.

action.text: Proposed amendment SA 1318 withdrawn in Senate.

Amendment SA 1318 proposed by Senator Reid. (consideration: CR S9681-9683; text: CR S9681) To appropriate $20,000,000 to the Office for Domestic Preparedness to be used for grants to urban areas with large tourist populations.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1318 proposed by Senator Reid.
